title: Summer pudding
description: Summer pudding is much easier to make than you think. Try our step-by-step video recipe for a perfect pudding.Equipment and preparation: You'll need a 1 litre/2 pint pudding basin.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 14oz mixed summer fruit (such as raspberries, red, white and blackcurrants, tayberries, loganberries, blackberries, cherries and blueberries
1 medium loaf good-quality white bread, slightly stale
